LanguageData.VFES_EnergyShieldEnergyMax.label: shield max energy
LanguageData.VFES_EnergyShieldEnergyMax.description: The maximum energy a shield generator can have at one time. More energy absorbs more damage.
LanguageData.VFES_EnergyShieldRechargeRate.label: shield recharge rate
LanguageData.VFES_EnergyShieldRechargeRate.descriptio: The rate at which a shield gains energy as long as it is not broken.
LanguageData.VFES_EnergyShieldRadius.label: shield radius
LanguageData.VFES_EnergyShieldRadius.description: The area covered when the energy shield is active.
